scripts.build: bun build src/toggle.ts --outfile dist/toggle.js --target bun --env inline --banner "$(cat raycast-header.txt)" && sed -i '' '/^\/\/ @bun$/d' dist/toggle.js && chmod +x dist/toggle.js
scripts.build:raycast: bun run build && cp dist/toggle.js ~/Documents/Raycast\ Scripts/spotify-dj.js
scripts.check: bunx tsc --noEmit && bunx biome check --write src/
